channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: ‘Knights of Guinevere’ Will Officially Return As a Full Series
item.description: The viewers have spoken, and Glitch has decided to continue 'Knights of Guinevere' with new episodes for the near future.

item.title: Disney accuses ByteDance of 'virtual smash-and-grab' when using copyrighted works to train its AI
item.description: Disney is going after another generative AI tool, accusing ByteDance and its recently released Seedance 2.0 of using its copyrighted material without permission. As first reported on by Axios, the Walt Disney Company sent a cease-and-desist letter to ByteDance, claiming the Chinese company developed its Seedance tool "with a pirated library of Disney's copyrighted characters from Star Wars, Marvel, and other Disney franchises, as if Disney's coveted intellectual property were free public domain clip art." The letter, which was obtained by Axios, included examples of Seedance videos featuring c...

item.title: “Pourquoi je ne recommanderais plus jamais une Tesla”, pire que Temu et Shein, et la batterie au sel, sans lithium – Le récap Survoltés
item.description: Cette semaine, l’univers de la voiture électrique a été secoué de toutes parts : coup d’éclat pour Tesla, avancées décisives chez BYD, lancement stratégique pour Genesis, et polémique en Italie. Voici les actualités qu'il ne fallait pas manquer cette semaine

item.title: ‘Clueless’ -inspired app Alta partners with brand Public School to start integrating styling tools into websites
item.description: This week, Alta unveiled its first integration collaboration, teaming up with Public School, a storied New York City brand.

item.title: This weekend you can get the DJI 4K drone for $60 off
item.description: This weekend Amazon has the DKI Mini 4K drone for 20% off

item.title: What to read this weekend: The unsettling new horror novel, Persona
item.description:
Need something new for your reading list? Here are two titles we think are worth checking out. This week, we read Aoife Josie Clements' deeply unsettling Persona, and the first issue of Bleeding Hearts, from the relaunch of the DC imprint, Vertigo.
This article originally appeared on Engadget at https://www.engadget.com/entertainment/what-to-read-this-weekend-the-unsettling-new-horror-novel-persona-185152256.html?src=rss...

item.title: Dems Want to Ban Surveillance Pricing at Big Grocery Stores
item.description: Is dynamic pricing the future of grocery stores?

item.title: ‘John Wick’ and ‘Castlevania’ Are the New Frontiers of Video Game Adaptations
item.description: The shadow of adaptation hovers over two of the more surprising State of Play reveals.

item.title: Trump Affiliates Bannon and Epshteyn Named in ‘Let’s Go Brandon’ Crypto Coin Lawsuit
item.description: The creators and promoters of the coin are facing accusations similar to those faced by the “Hawk Tuah” girl.

item.title: Boulanger frappe fort en retirant 20 % sur ce moniteur QD-OLED rafraîchi à 240 Hz, l’écran ultime pour vos FPS
item.description: Avis aux gamers, voici l’écran parfait pour assurer lors de vos sessions de jeux : ce Lenovo Legion 27Q-10 propose une dalle QD-OLED ultra-réactive pour un prix encore plus doux grâce à cette remise de 20 % chez Boulanger.
